title: Feature Spotlight: Real-time Analytics
body:
Discover the power of Real-time Analytics!

Track your workflow performance with live dashboards.

Use cases:
- Monitor execution times
- Track success rates
- Identify bottlenecks

Learn more at levqor.ai/features/analytics
